mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.impl.SerialScanningGRMapper.serialScanningGRCommonCode] - KR JUN */ SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_MASTER_ID , CODE , CODE_NAME , CODE_DESC FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = #{codeMasterId}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.impl.SerialScanningGRMapper.serialScanningGRDataList] - KR JUN */ SELECT l55.DELVRY_NO AS delno --, l55.REQST_NO AS reqstno --, TO_CHAR(l47.REQST_CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS reqstdt , L47.REQST_TYPE AS reqsttype , l47.TRNSC_TYPE AS trnsctype , l47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL AS trnsctypedtl , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28c.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS frmloc , l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC AS frmlocid , l47.REQST_CDC_RDC AS tolocid , NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l54.DELVRY_DT, 'yyyymmdd'), 'dd/mm/yyyy'), '-') AS deldate , SUM(l55.DELVRY_QTY) AS delqty , l54.CRT_USER_ID AS crt , TO_CHAR(l54.CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS crtdt --, l47.REF_DOC_NO FROM LOG0047M l47 , LOG0055D l55 , LOG0054M l54 , SYS0028M s28c , sys0028m s28q WHERE l47.REQST_NO = l55.REQST_NO AND l54.DELVRY_NO = l55.DELVRY_NO AND l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC = s28c.WH_LOC_ID(+) and l47.reqst_cdc_rdc = s28q.wh_loc_id(+) AND L54.DELVRY_DT >= to_char(to_date(#{searchDeliverySDate},'dd/mm/yyyy'),'yyyymmdd') -- FROM AND L54.DELVRY_DT <= to_char(to_date(#{searchDeliveryEDate},'dd/mm/yyyy'),'yyyymmdd') -- TO AND (1, l47.REQST_CDC_RDC) IN
(1, #{item})
AND l47.trnsc_type IN ('US','UM') AND l54.DELVRY_GI_CMPLT = 'Y' AND NVL(l54.DEL_FLAG, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(l54.DELVRY_GR_CMPLT, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(l55.del_flag,'N') <> 'Y' AND s28q.SERIAL_REQUIRE_CHK_YN = 'Y'
AND (l55.DELVRY_NO = #{searchDeliveryOrRequestNo} OR l55.REQST_NO = #{searchDeliveryOrRequestNo} OR l47.REF_DOC_NO = #{searchDeliveryOrRequestNo})
GROUP BY l55.DELVRY_NO, L47.REQST_TYPE, l47.TRNSC_TYPE, l47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL, s28c.WH_LOC_DESC, l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC, l47.REQST_CDC_RDC, l54.DELVRY_DT, l54.CRT_USER_ID, l54.CRT_DT ORDER BY l55.DELVRY_NO DESC
